discourse_list.title: Ethcode - the vscode plugin for Ethereum

content.content: Hello everyone, We are a small team building Ethcode a vscode plugin for ethereum smart contract development. We have been working on this tool for many months now. Ethcode has some amazing abilities that vscode users might have been missing:  Compile solidity, Vyper Deploy compiled contracts Call functions, create transactions Sign transactions locally with your keys Deploy transactions to Test and Main network  Screenshot from 2020-07-28 07-20-431920×1080 237 KB Please install our plugin from Visual Studio Marketplace Join our Discord channel for any help or questions. If you find any issues using our plugin feel free to report.
